name: Ext_R5_Encounter_pa_actor
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Encounter.participant.actor for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Encounter.participant.actor from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Encounter|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The individual, device, or service participating in the encounter
element.definition: Person involved in the encounter, the patient/group is also included here to indicate that the patient was actually participating in the encounter. Not including the patient here covers use cases such as a case meeting between practitioners about a patient - non contact times.
element.comment: `Encounter.participant.actor` maps to R4B `Encounter.participant.individual`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Patient)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Group)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/HealthcareService)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
